verses.verse: שִׁ֣ירוּ <WH7891> Shi-ru O sing לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> shir song חָדָ֑שׁ <WH2319> cha-Dash; a new שִׁ֥ירוּ <WH7891> Shi-ru sing לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. all the earth

שִׁ֣ירוּ <WH7891> Shi-ru Sing לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu bless שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo; his name בַּשְּׂר֥וּ <WH1319> bas-se-Ru shew forth מִיּֽוֹם־ <WH3117> mi-yom- from day לְ֝י֗וֹם <WH3117> le-Yom, to day יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-To. his salvation

סַפְּר֣וּ <WH5608> sap-pe-Ru Declare בַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> vag-go-Yim among the heathen כְּבוֹד֑וֹ <WH3519> ke-vo-Do; his glory בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָֽ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, among all people נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tav. his wonders

כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki For גָ֘ד֤וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] great יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <WH1984> u-me-hul-Lal to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; and greatly נוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> no-Ra he [is] to be feared ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. above all gods

כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> ki for כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- for all אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei For all the gods הָעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim of the nations אֱלִילִ֑ים <WH457> 'e-li-Lim; [are] idols וַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh but the LORD שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim the heavens עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> 'a-Sah. made

הוֹד־ <WH1935> hod- Honour וְהָדָ֥ר <WH1926> ve-ha-Dar and majesty לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav; [are] before עֹ֥ז <WH5797> 'oz him strength וְ֝תִפְאֶ֗רֶת <WH8597> ve-tif-'E-ret, and beauty בְּמִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH4720> be-mik-da-Sho. [are] in his sanctuary

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu Give לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot O ye kindreds עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim; of the people הָב֥וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu give לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> ka-Vod glory וָעֹֽז׃ <WH5797> va-'Oz. and strength

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu Give לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo; [due unto] his name שְׂאֽוּ־ <WH5375> se-'u- bring מִ֝נְחָ֗ה <WH4503> min-Chah, an offering וּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> u-Vo-'u and come לְחַצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH2691> le-chatz-ro-Tav. into his courts

הִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> hish-ta-cha-Vu O worship לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <WH1927> be-had-rat- in the beauty קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh; of holiness חִ֥ילוּ <WH2342> Chi-lu fear מִ֝פָּנָ֗יו <WH6440> mip-pa-Nav, before כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. him all the earth

אִמְר֤וּ <WH559> 'im-Ru Say בַגּוֹיִ֨ם׀ <WH1471> vag-go-Yim among the heathen יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [that] the LORD מָלָ֗ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach, reigneth אַף־ <WH637> 'af- Indeed תִּכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> tik-Kon also shall be established תֵּ֭בֵל <WH8398> Te-vel the world בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> tim-Mot; that it shall not be moved יָדִ֥ין <WH1777> ya-Din he shall judge עַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim, the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> be-mei-sha-Rim. righteously

יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <WH8055> yis-me-Chu rejoice הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> Hash-sha-ma-yim Let the heavens וְתָגֵ֣ל <WH1523> ve-ta-Gel be glad הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; and let the earth יִֽרְעַ֥ם <WH7481> yir-'Am roar הַ֝יָּ֗ם <WH3220> hai-Yam, let the sea וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃ <WH4393> u-me-lo-'O. and the fulness

יַעֲלֹ֣ז <WH5937> ya-'a-Loz be joyful שָׂ֭דַי <WH7704> dai Let the field וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after בּ֑וֹ bo; אָ֥ז <WH227> 'az Then יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> ye-ran-ne-Nu, rejoice כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> 'a-tzei- and all that [is] therein then shall all the trees יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> Ya-'ar. of the wood

לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> lif-Nei Before יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כִּ֬י <WH3588> ki for בָ֗א <WH935> Va, for he cometh כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for בָא֮ <WH935> va for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <WH8199> lish-Pot to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <WH8199> yish-pot- he shall judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> te-Vel the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> be-Tze-dek; with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> ve-'am-Mim, and the people בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH530> be-'e-mu-na-To. with his truth
